description: A request to the NATS $SYS monitoring endpoint for gateway information
title: io.nats.server.monitor.v1.gatewayz_request

name.description: Filter to only show remote gateways with this name

accounts.description: Include accounts with their interest in the results

account_name.description: Limit the list of accounts to this account name (makes accounts implicit)

subscriptions.description: Include subscriptions in the results (only used if accounts or account_name are specified)

subscriptions_detail.description: Include subscription details in the results (only used if accounts or account_name are specified)
